revised_title: Satellite Communications in the 1980s and Beyond
tldr: This article discusses the advancements and future prospects of satellite communications in the 1980s. It highlights the growth of the Intelsat system, which spans the globe with satellites covering various regions. The article also explores the technology behind satellite systems, including the use of new frequency bands, spatial separation, and polarization discrimination. Additionally, it touches upon the development of Earth stations and their improvements over the years.
